text: Stumbled upon this jewel of a restaurant and we’re so glad we ate here! The food was absolutely delicious - we spoke to the chef to give him our compliments and it was lovely to see how passionate and detail-oriented he is about his creations.
Food is nice and special with great food presentation.Nice ambience for gathering and anniversary celebration. Good service ! Will definitely visit again 😉

Love the France Cuisine & Fine Dining here.
The food is well prepared by the Chef Sky Chan from Michelin Restaurant.

When all the dishes served, the Chef will explained individually what is the ingredient inside before we taste the food. Friendly and detailed Care from the Chef 🥰

Ambient and rennovation feels Comfortable & Relaxable. 🤩

Highly recommendation  for the restaurant
When u can enjoy a memorable celebration or fine dining experience here 🥰

Food is definitely worth the price, portion is great not your average casual dining, worth every cent, the chief pour his heart into each and every detail on the dish 🤤🤤will come back for the delicious food 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

Great food and environment!
Had an amazing modern cuisine experience.
